name: BLUE EYES (itch)
description:
Blue eyes, lost in the dark, victims of violence and haunted by bloody monsters, spinning their way through the deadly maze, right in the direction of the blue eyes.... And you dare to protect them and make them a way through the maze? Well, good Luck.

BLUE EYES is an athmospheric rage-game based on strategy, timing and learning from targets. 

The Rules

-Edges are safe, most of the time

-Monsters build chains and spin through the maze

-New monsters appear the more you complete the maze

-WASD to move
